00017 void ClusteringMachine::printD(CArray<INode*> &node, CArray<ICluster*> &cluster) {
00018         // TEMP: DEBUG OUTPUT
00019         log->WriteLine(String::Format("iter={0}, alpha={1:f4}, clusters={2}", nIteration, alpha, C));
00020         log->Write("nodeID, ");
00021         for (int ic = 0; ic < cluster.GetCount(); ic++)
00022                 log->Write(String::Format("{0}, ", cluster[ic]->id));
00023         log->WriteLine("");
00024         double goal = 0;
00025         for (int i = 0; i < node.GetCount(); i++) {     
00026                 double sumU = 0;
00027                 log->Write(String::Format("{0} ,  ", node[i]->id));
00028                 for (int ic = 0; ic < cluster.GetCount(); ic++) {
00029                         Record* r;
00030                         cluster[ic]->rec.Lookup(node[i]->id, r);
00031                         //if (r->u > 0.00)
00032                         log->Write(String::Format("{0:f2} : {1:f2} : {2:f2}  : {3:f2}  : {4:f2},  ", r->u, r->u_RR, r->u_Bias, r->psi, r->d));
00033                         sumU += r->u;
00034                         goal += r->u*r->u*r->d;
00035                         /*else
00036                         log->Write(String::Format(" ,  "));*/
00037                 }
00038                 log->Write(String::Format("Sum(u)={0:f2}", sumU));
00039                 log->WriteLine("");
00040         }
00041         log->WriteLine("goal={0:f2}",goal);
00042         log->WriteLine("--------------");
00043         // END TEMP: DEBUG OUTPUT
00044 }
00045 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00046 void ClusteringMachine::RunFuzzy(CArray<INode*> &node, CArray<ICluster*> &cluster) {
00047         log = File::CreateText("F:\\My Documents\\My Research\\Results\\Data\\Activity Data\\ClusteringMachineLog.csv");
00048         // (1) If no events, return
00049         if (!node.GetCount())
00050                 return;
00051 
00052         // (2) Create an initial set of clusters
00053         InitializeClusters(node, cluster);
00054         printD(node, cluster);  
00055         // (3) Run fuzzy agglomerative clustering
00056         //log->WriteLine(String::Format("nIteration, alpha, C"));
00057         while (C > 0 && (param.maxIterations == 0 || nIteration < param.maxIterations) ) {
00058                 // (3.1) Update distance matrix
00059                 UpdateDistanceMatrix(node, cluster);
00060                 // (3.2) Update medians
00061                 UpdateClusterMedians(node, cluster);
00062                 // (3.3) Update robust estimators
00063                 UpdateEstimators(node, cluster);
00064                 // (3.4) Update stabilizing coefficient alpha
00065                 UpdateAlpha(node, cluster);
00066                 // (3.5) Update cluster partition matrix
00067                 UpdatePartitionMatrix(node, cluster);
00068                 // (3.6) Discard clusters with N < minCardinality
00069                 DiscardWeakClusters(node, cluster);
00070                 printD(node, cluster);
00071 
00072 
00073                 cTuning = max(param.cTuningMin, cTuning-param.cTuningDelta);
00074                 nIteration++;
00075 
00076 
00077                 StepProgressDialog();
00078                 
00079         }
00080 
00081         // (4) Cleanup
00082         log->Close();
00083         isRunning = false;
00084 }

00086 void ClusteringMachine::InitializeClusters(CArray<INode*> &node, CArray<ICluster*> &cluster) {
00087         // form initialize parameters 
00088         C = Cmax = param.maxClusters;
00089         nIteration = 0; eta = 0; alpha = 0;
00090         cTuning = param.cTuning0;
00091         for (int i1 = 0; i1 < C; i1++)
00092                 cluster.Add(new SwarmActivity(node));
00093         // form initial clusters 
00094         CArray<int> inCluster;
00095         
00096         for (int i1 = 0; i1 < node.GetCount(); i1++)
00097                 inCluster.Add(-1);
00098 
00099         for (int i1 = 0; i1 < node.GetCount(); i1++) {
00100                 // if already in cluster go to next
00101                 if (inCluster[i1] >= 0)
00102                         continue;
00103 
00104                 // find the closest node
00105                 double minDist = DBL_MAX; int minI;
00106                 for (int i2 = 0; i2 < node.GetCount(); i2++) {
00107                         double dist = node[i1]->Distance(node[i2]);
00108                         if (dist < minDist) {
00109                                 minDist = dist;
00110                                 minI = i2;
00111                         }
00112                 }
00113         
00114                 // if closest node in cluster, add to that cluster
00115                 int idx;
00116                 if (minDist < param.minNodeDistance && inCluster[minI] >= 0) 
00117                         idx = inCluster[minI];
00118                 else 
00119                         idx = (int)(cluster.GetCount()*cvRandReal(&rnd_seed));
00120 
00121                 cluster[idx]->Add(node[i1]);
00122         }
00123 
00124         // normalize cluster membership
00125         //for (int i1 = 0; i1 < cluster.GetCount(); i1++) {
00126         //      if (cluster[i1]->nNodes > 0) {
00127         //              for (POSITION pos = cluster[i1]->rec.GetStartPosition(); pos != NULL;) {
00128         //                      int nid; Record* r;
00129         //                      cluster[i1]->rec.GetNextAssoc(pos, nid, r);
00130         //                      r->u /= cluster[i1]->nNodes; // BUG: u must be zero for all non clustered nodes
00131         //              }
00132         //      }
00133         //}
00134 }

00136 void ClusteringMachine::UpdateDistanceMatrix(CArray<INode*> &node, CArray<ICluster*> &cluster) {
00137         double dmin = DBL_MAX, dmax = DBL_MIN;
00138 
00139         for (int i1 = 0; i1 < cluster.GetCount(); i1++) {
00140                 double T1, T2;
00141                 int Tlt = 0, Tgt = 0; // less than, greater than
00142                 ICluster* c = cluster[i1];
00143                 for (int i2 = 0; i2 < node.GetCount(); i2++) {
00144                         INode*  n = node[i2];
00145                         double d = c->Distance(n);
00146                         c->rec[n->id]->d = d;
00147                         if (d < dmin)
00148                                 dmin = d;
00149 
00150                         if (d > dmax)
00151                                 dmax = d;
00152                 }
00153         }
00154         log->WriteLine(String::Format("dmin = {0:f2} dmax = {1:f2}", dmin, dmax));
00155 }
00156 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00157 void ClusteringMachine::UpdateClusterMedians(CArray<INode*> &node, CArray<ICluster*> &cluster) {
00158 
00159         double maxK = 0;
00160         for (int i = 0; i < cluster.GetCount(); i++) {
00161                 ICluster * c = cluster[i];
00162                 c->UpdateMedian();
00163                 c->UpdateMAD();
00164                 if (c->S == 0)
00165                         c->S = DBL_MIN;//cluster.RemoveAt(i);
00166                 double K = (5*c->T+cTuning*c->S)/6;
00167                 if (K > maxK)
00168                         maxK = K;
00169         }
00170         
00171         for (int i = 0; i < cluster.GetCount(); i++) {
00172                 ICluster * c = cluster[i];
00173                 c->K = maxK - (5*c->T+cTuning*c->S)/6;
00174         }
00175 }

00178         //for(POSITION pos = rec.GetStartPosition();pos != NULL;) {
00179         for (int i = 0; i < cluster.GetCount(); i++) {
00180                 cluster[i]->UpdateRho(cTuning);
00181                 cluster[i]->UpdatePsi(cTuning);
00182         }
00183 }
00184 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00185 void ClusteringMachine::UpdateAlpha(CArray<INode*> &node, CArray<ICluster*> &cluster) {
00186         double num = 0, denom = 0, denomC = 0;
00187         eta = param.eta0*exp(-abs(param.nIteration0-nIteration)/param.tau);
00188         for (int i = 0; i < cluster.GetCount(); i++) {
00189                 denomC = 0;
00190                 for (POSITION pos = cluster[i]->rec.GetStartPosition(); pos != NULL;) {
00191                         int nid; Record* r;
00192                         cluster[i]->rec.GetNextAssoc(pos, nid, r);
00193                         num += r->u*r->u*r->rho;
00194                         denomC += r->psi*r->u; 
00195                 }
00196                 denom += denomC*denomC;
00197         }
00198         if (Double::IsNaN(alpha) || Double::IsInfinity(alpha) || Double::IsNegativeInfinity(alpha)
00199                 || Double::IsNaN(num) || Double::IsInfinity(num) || Double::IsNegativeInfinity(num)
00200                 || Double::IsNaN(denom) || Double::IsInfinity(denom) || Double::IsNegativeInfinity(denom))
00201                 int a = 1;
00202         alpha = eta*num/denom;
00203 
00204 }
00205 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00206 void ClusteringMachine::UpdatePartitionMatrix(CArray<INode*> &node, CArray<ICluster*> &cluster) {
00207         for (int i = 0; i < node.GetCount(); i++) {
00208                 Nnode[node[i]->id] = 0;
00209                 NnodeN[node[i]->id] = 0;
00210         }
00211         for (int i = 0; i < cluster.GetCount(); i++) {
00212                 for (POSITION pos = cluster[i]->rec.GetStartPosition(); pos != NULL;) {
00213                         int nid; Record* r;
00214                         cluster[i]->rec.GetNextAssoc(pos, nid, r);
00215                         ASSERT(!Double::IsNaN(r->rho) && !Double::IsInfinity(r->rho));
00216                         double d;
00217 
00218                         if (NnodeN.Lookup(nid, d)) 
00219                                 NnodeN[nid] = d + cluster[i]->N/r->rho;
00220 
00221                         if (Nnode.Lookup(nid, d))
00222                                 Nnode[nid] = d + 1/r->rho;
00223                 }
00224         }
00225 
00226         double u_RRmin=DBL_MAX, u_RRmax=-DBL_MAX, u_Biasmin=DBL_MAX, u_Biasmax=-DBL_MAX;
00227         for (int i = 0; i < cluster.GetCount(); i++) {
00228                 for (POSITION pos = cluster[i]->rec.GetStartPosition(); pos != NULL;) {
00229                         int nid; Record* r;
00230                         cluster[i]->rec.GetNextAssoc(pos, nid, r);
00231                         r->u_RR = 1/r->rho/Nnode[nid];
00232                         double nN, nn;
00233                         if (!NnodeN.Lookup(nid, nN) || !Nnode.Lookup(nid, nn))
00234                                 ASSERT(false);
00235                         r->u_Bias = alpha/r->rho*(cluster[i]->N - nN/nn);
00236                         r->u = max(min(r->u_RR+r->u_Bias,1), 0);
00237                         //if (u_RR < u_RRmin)
00238                         //      u_RRmin = u_RR;
00239                         //if (u_RR > u_RRmax)
00240                         //      u_RRmax = u_RR;
00241                         //if (u_Bias < u_Biasmin)
00242                         //      u_Biasmin = u_Bias;
00243                         //if (u_Bias > u_Biasmax)
00244                         //      u_Biasmax = u_Bias;
00245                         
00246                 }
00247                 cluster[i]->UpdateN();
00248         }
00249         //log->WriteLine(String::Format("u_RRmin = {0:f2} u_RRmax = {1:f2} u_Biasmin = {2:f2} u_Biasmax = {3:f2}", u_RRmin, u_RRmax, u_Biasmin, u_Biasmax));
00250 }
00251 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00252 void ClusteringMachine::DiscardWeakClusters(CArray<INode*> &node, CArray<ICluster*> &cluster) {
00253         for (int i = 0; i < cluster.GetCount(); i++) {
00254                 if (cluster[i]->N < param.minCardinality)
00255                         cluster.RemoveAt(i);
00256         }
00257         C = cluster.GetCount();
00258 }
00259 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00260 void ICluster::UpdateRho(double cTuning) {
00261         for (POSITION pos = rec.GetStartPosition(); pos != NULL;) {
00262                 int nid; Record* r;
00263                 rec.GetNextAssoc(pos, nid, r);
00264                 if (r->d <= T)
00265                         r->rho = r->d - ( r->d*r->d*r->d / (6*T*T) );
00266                 else if (r->d > T+cTuning*S) 
00267                         r->rho = (5*T+cTuning*S)/6+K;
00268                 else
00269                         r->rho = pow(r->d-(T+cTuning*S), 3)/(6*cTuning*cTuning*S*S) + (5*T+cTuning*S)/6;
00270                 //ASSERT(!(Double::IsNaN(r->rho) || Double::IsInfinity(r->rho) || Double::IsNegativeInfinity(r->rho)));
00271         }
00272 }
00273 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00274 void ICluster::UpdatePsi(double cTuning) {
00275         for (POSITION pos = rec.GetStartPosition(); pos != NULL;) {
00276                 int nid; Record* r;
00277                 rec.GetNextAssoc(pos, nid, r);
00278                 if (r->d <= T)
00279                         r->psi = 1-r->d*r->d/(2*T*T);
00280                 else if (r->d > T+cTuning*S) 
00281                         r->psi = 0;
00282                 else
00283                         r->psi = pow((r->d-(T+cTuning*S)), 2)/(2*cTuning*cTuning*S*S);
00284                 //ASSERT(!(Double::IsNaN(r->psi) || Double::IsInfinity(r->psi) || Double::IsNegativeInfinity(r->psi)));
00285         }
00286 }
00287 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00288 void ICluster::UpdateN() {
00289         N = 0;
00290         for (POSITION pos = rec.GetStartPosition(); pos != NULL;) {
00291                 int nid; Record* r;
00292                 rec.GetNextAssoc(pos, nid, r);
00293                 N += r->psi*r->u;
00294         }
00295 }
00296 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00297 template <typename T> 
00298 void swap(T &a, T& b) {
00299         T t = a;
00300         a = b;
00301         b = t;
00302 }
00303 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00304 template <typename T>
00305 void select(T a[], int size, int k) {
00306         int newMOMIdx = partition(a, size, k);
00307         if (k < newMOMIdx)
00308                 select(a, newMOMIdx, k);
00309         else if (k > newMOMIdx)
00310                 select(a + newMOMIdx + 1, size - newMOMIdx - 1, k - newMOMIdx - 1);
00311 }
00312 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00313 template <typename T>
00314 int partition(T a[], int size, int pivot) {
00315         int pivotValue = a[pivot];
00316         swap(a[pivot], a[size-1]);
00317         int storePos = 0;
00318         for(int loadPos=0; loadPos < size-1; loadPos++) {
00319                 if (a[loadPos] < pivotValue) {
00320                         swap(a[loadPos], a[storePos]);
00321                         storePos++;
00322                 }
00323         }
00324         swap(a[storePos], a[size-1]);
00325         return storePos;
00326 }
00327 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00328 template <typename T>
00329 T medianOf5(T aTmp[]) {
00330         // find the median of medians
00331         if (aTmp[1] < aTmp[0]) 
00332         swap(aTmp[0], aTmp[1]);
00333         if (aTmp[2] < aTmp[0])
00334         swap(aTmp[0], aTmp[2]); 
00335         if (aTmp[3] < aTmp[0])
00336         swap(aTmp[0], aTmp[3]);
00337         if (aTmp[4] < aTmp[0])
00338         swap(aTmp[0], aTmp[4]);
00339 
00340         if (aTmp[2] < aTmp[1])
00341         swap(aTmp[1], aTmp[2]);
00342         if (aTmp[3] < aTmp[1])
00343         swap(aTmp[1], aTmp[3]);
00344         if (aTmp[4] < aTmp[1])
00345         swap(aTmp[1], aTmp[4]);
00346 
00347         if (aTmp[3] < aTmp[2])
00348         swap(aTmp[2], aTmp[3]);
00349         if (aTmp[4] < aTmp[2])
00350         swap(aTmp[2], aTmp[4]);
00351         return aTmp[2];
00352 }
00353 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00354 void ICluster::UpdateMedian() {
00355         // create temp array
00356         int size = rec.GetCount();
00357         if (size < 5) {
00358                 AfxMessageBox("Less than 5 events! Can't you count them manually? ;-)");
00359                 return;
00360         }
00361         double *aTmp = new double[size];
00362         int n = 0;
00363         for (POSITION pos = rec.GetStartPosition(); pos;) {
00364                 int nid; Record* r;
00365                 rec.GetNextAssoc(pos, nid, r);
00366                 aTmp[n] = r->d;
00367                 n++;
00368         }
00369 
00370         // find 5 medians of 5 sub-arrays
00371         int numMedians = size/5;
00372         int MOMIdx = numMedians/2;
00373         select(aTmp, numMedians, MOMIdx);
00374         T = medianOf5(aTmp);
00375         delete[] aTmp;
00376 }
00377 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00378 // compute median of absolute deviations
00379 void ICluster::UpdateMAD() {
00380         // create temp array
00381         int size = rec.GetCount();
00382         double *aTmp = new double[size];
00383         int n = 0;
00384         if (size < 5) {
00385                 AfxMessageBox("Less than 5 events! Can't you count them manually? ;-)");
00386                 return;
00387         }
00388         for (POSITION pos = rec.GetStartPosition(); pos;) {
00389                 int nid; Record* r;
00390                 rec.GetNextAssoc(pos, nid, r);
00391                 aTmp[n++] = fabs(r->d-T);
00392         }
00393 
00394         // find 5 medians of 5 sub-arrays
00395         int numMedians = size/5;
00396         int MOMIdx = numMedians/2;
00397         select(aTmp, numMedians, MOMIdx);
00398         S = medianOf5(aTmp);
00399 
00400         delete[] aTmp;
00401 }
